pageProps.title: ruby-spacy
pageProps.teaser: Wrapper module for using spaCy from Ruby via PyCall

data.title: ruby-spacy
data.slogan: Wrapper module for using spaCy from Ruby via PyCall
data.description: ruby-spacy is a wrapper module for using spaCy from the Ruby programming language via PyCall. This module aims to make it easy and natural for Ruby programmers to use spaCy.
code_example: doc = nlp.read("Apple is looking at buying U.K. startup for $1 billion")

data.author: Yoichiro Hasebe
